content: {"name": "Springfield/Franconia Family Resource Center", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Its in person pantry, people have to go and get registered and they wil give a time for pick up", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "7224 Commerce Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Springfield", "state_province": "VA", "postal_code": "22150", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 38.78171359999999, "longitude": -77.19128529999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(703) 644-0000", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}]}
